page.title: 15THE SCHOOL
page.content:
The{classroom}has lots of{pictures}and some prints. There are lots of{chairs} and five{tables.}There are some scales, rulers and there are lots of books. There are some bunches of {flowers.}We went to look around the{ {hall.}There are thirty three{windows and there is some{pottery}and there are some patterned prints. There is a big piece of{apparatus}with round hoops in it. Mrs Hewitt is a{dinner lady}because she{cooks}dinners for all the children. The other dinner lady is called Mrs Marjoram. They have a{food {store}where they put all the food.
(By Kathryn Abram 6 years.)
